thread.title: Afternoon tea
thread.title_full: Afternoon tea - Review of The Montcalm London Marble Arch, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Caroline M
title: Afternoon tea
text: Me and my mum had a lovely afternoon tea here on the 22nd of march for her special 60th birthday, staff were very friendly and helpful we was late due to getting lost! And they didn't mode at all it had also been taking and they helped us to get dyre. The sandwiches were very fresh could tell mthey were made on the day and the cakes were lovely to very fresh and lots to choice from including teas,coffee and hot chocolate! Overall I would go back due to great service and good food and not badly price either.
